title: Leaving
body:
Leaving

Evan walked out of the academy, and looked around him.

It was a new day, and many things were different from yesterday.Â 

For Evan, the biggest difference was that in one night he got a promotion.

If yesterday he was a scumbag then today he is a big scumbag!

Yes, he received a big promotion.

For some reason, the article where he used dark skills to harass females is spreading at rapid speed.

His nonexistent reputation is at all time low.

If before his reputation was zero then now it is minus 100.

After coming out Evan once again walked towards the taxi station. Currently, he was wearing big black sunglasses and a mask to hide his face.

Even though he didn't care what people think about him he still doesn't want someone to throw a rotten egg on him which is why he decided to wear a mask while going out.

Of course, with the mask and the sunglasses, he was only able to deceive normal people.
